english.segment1: She won't falter easy. She'll be careful, she'll be coy. But still she paints her heart. Among the musings of a boy
english.segment2: If You find her. Tell her that I love her. If she hears You. Ask her heart to come
english.segment3: At the break of morning. The day awaits her when she sleeps. Deep inside her dreams is all. The beauty that she keeps.
